title: Critical Strike
body: It has come to my attention that Critical Strike, more commonly referred to as Crit is one dumb ass stat and should be removed from the game.

replies.body:
It should be a numbers based system instead of percent based.

50% crit = Every 2nd attack will be a guaranteed crit.

20% crit = Every 5th attack will be a guaranteed crit.

80% crit = Every 5th attack will NOT be a crit.

The attack counter should not be shown to give it a small amount of skill factor that still completely removes luck. This way calculating damage will be accurate without the luck factoring in.
it is more or less stupid coz it has nothing to do with skill, but rather luck. and i dont think luck should be in a game....who knows? maybe riot will change/remove it {{summoner:14}}

Honestly I think Riot will remove it when they find another system to replace it, but it won't be for a while.

They've said a lot about how they hate RNG and want things to have counter play. But when a Lucian v Cait is IE v IE and Cait crits 4 times in a row and Lucian gets 0 crits, your kinda fuked.
